original_text: Whatever touches its flesh shall be holy, and when any of its blood is splashed on a garment, you shall wash that on which it was splashed in a holy place.
korean_text: 그 고기에 접촉하는 모든 자는 거룩할 것이며 그 피가 어떤 옷에든지 묻었으면 묻은 그것을 거룩한 곳에서 빨 것이요

sentences.original_text: Whatever touches its flesh shall be holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 살에 닿는 모든 것은 거룩하다.

sentences.original_text: when any of its blood is splashed on a garment
